ygData.subject: Re: Doctrine of Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do not worry.. Levitate floats you down to a height where you wont get hurt when you fall.. Still high enough for monsters not to reach :)
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Doctrine of Wizardry
>Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 10:37:34 +0200
>
>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>
>According to p00pb0t:
> > According to a Gnome Wizard I met last evening levitate does some other
>neat things like, cast it when on a high cliff, attack a beast and walk a
>good bit off the cliff. Guess who cant touch you now ;)
>
>Hmmm, watch carefully for the icon. It wouldn't do if the icon started
>blinking
>when you really need that last bit of mana :)
>

Do not worry.. Levitate floats you down to a height where you wont get hurt
when you fall.. Still high enough for monsters not to reach :)
